00030 #include "util/Convert.h"

00032 #include <cassert>

00035 /**
00036  * Class for calculating probe coordinates using a sequential
00037  * clf file.
00038  */
00039 class SequentialClfFile
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   /**
00043    * Constructor.
00044    */
00045   SequentialClfFile (void);
00046 
00047   /**
00048    * Check whether a clf file is sequential.
00049    *
00050    * @param clfTsv Clf file tsv object.
00051    * @return bool Returns true if the file is sequential, else false.
00052    */
00053   bool isSequential (affx::TsvFile& clfTsv);
00054 
00055   /**
00056    * Calculate the coordinates of a probe, given its id.
00057    *
00058    * @param probeId Probe id.
00059    * @param x Calculated x value.
00060    * @param y Calculated y value.
00061    */
00062   void getProbeCoordinates (const int probeId, int& x, int& y);
00063 
00064 private:
00065   /// Number of rows.
00066   unsigned int m_Rows;
00067   /// Number of columns.
00068   unsigned int m_Cols;
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif /* SEQUENTIAL_CLF_FILE_H */
